00046 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const char * szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00047 {
00048         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00049         if(bCaseSensitive)
00050         {
00051                 while(*szKey)
00052                 {
00053                         uResult += (unsigned char)(*(szKey));
00054                         szKey++;
00055                 }
00056         } else {
00057                 while(*szKey)
00058                 {
00059                         uResult += (unsigned char)tolower(*(szKey));
00060                         szKey++;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         return uResult;
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const char * szKey1,const char * szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00067 {
00068         if(bCaseSensitive)
00069         {
00070                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00071                 {
00072                         if(*szKey1 != *szKey2)
00073                                 return false;
00074                         szKey1++;
00075                         szKey2++;
00076                 }
00077         } else {
00078                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00079                 {
00080                         if(tolower(*szKey1) != tolower(*szKey2))
00081                                 return false;
00082                         szKey1++;
00083                         szKey2++;
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         //check if one of the strings is a substring of the other (like "perl" and "perlcore")
00087         if(*szKey1 || *szKey2)
00088                 return false;
00089         return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline void kvi_hash_key_copy(const char * const &szFrom,const char * &szTo,bool bDeepCopy)
00093 {
00094         if(bDeepCopy)
00095         {
00096                 int len = kvi_strLen(szFrom);
00097                 char * dst = (char *)kvi_malloc(len+1);
00098                 kvi_fastmove(dst,szFrom,len+1);
00099                 szTo = dst;
00100         } else {
00101                 szTo = szFrom; // we never modify it anyway
00102         }
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline void kvi_hash_key_destroy(const char * &szKey,bool bDeepCopy)
00106 {
00107         if(bDeepCopy)
00108                 kvi_free(szKey);
00109 }

00112 {
00113         static const char * static_null = NULL;
00114         return static_null;
00115 }

00117 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const KviStr &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00118 {
00119         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00120         const char * p = szKey.ptr();
00121         if(bCaseSensitive)
00122         {
00123                 while(*p)
00124                 {
00125                         uResult += *((const unsigned char *)p);
00126                         p++;
00127                 }
00128         } else {
00129                 while(*p)
00130                 {
00131                         uResult += tolower(*((const unsigned char *)p));
00132                         p++;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         return uResult;
00136 }
00137 
00138 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const KviStr &szKey1,const KviStr &szKey2)
00139 {
00140         return kvi_hash_key_equal(szKey1.ptr(),szKey2.ptr());
00141 }

00207 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(void * pKey,bool)
00208 {
00209         unsigned char * pBytes = (unsigned char *)&(pKey);
00210         unsigned char * pEnd = pBytes + sizeof(void *);
00211         unsigned int uSum = 0;
00212         while(pBytes < pEnd)
00213         {
00214                 uSum += *pBytes;
00215                 pBytes++;
00216         }
00217         return uSum;
00218 }

00221 {
00222         return pKey1 == pKey2;

00240 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const QString &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00241 {
00242         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00243         const QChar * p = KviQString::nullTerminatedArray(szKey);
00244         if(!p)return 0;
00245         if(bCaseSensitive)
00246         {
00247                 while(p->unicode())
00248                 {
00249                         uResult += p->unicode();
00250                         p++;
00251                 }
00252         } else {
00253                 while(p->unicode())
00254                 {
00255                         uResult += p->toLower().unicode();
00256                         p++;
00257                 }
00258         }
00259         return uResult;
00260 }
00261 
00262 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const QString &szKey1,const QString &szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00263 {
00264         if(bCaseSensitive)
00265                 return KviQString::equalCS(szKey1,szKey2);
00266         return KviQString::equalCI(szKey1,szKey2);
00267 }

00270 {
00271         szTo = szFrom;

00276 }

00279 {

00283 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTable;
00284 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator;
00285 
00286 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableEntry
00287 {
00288         friend class KviPointerHashTable<Key,T>;
00289 protected:
00290         T  * pData;
00291         Key  hKey;
00292 public:
00293         Key & key(){ return hKey; };
00294         T * data(){ return pData; };
00295 };
00296 
00336 template<class Key,class T> class KviPointerHashTable
00337 {
00338         friend class KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T>;
00339 protected:
00340         KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > ** m_pDataArray;
00341         bool                                                m_bAutoDelete;
00342         unsigned int                                        m_uSize;
00343         unsigned int                                        m_uCount;
00344         bool                                                m_bCaseSensitive;
00345         bool                                                m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00346         unsigned int                                        m_uIteratorIdx;
00347 public:
00356         T * find(const Key & hKey)
00357         {
00358                 m_uIteratorIdx = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00359                 if(!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return 0;
00360                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00361                 {
00362                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))return (T *)e->pData;
00363                 }
00364                 return 0;
00365         }
00366 
00376         T * operator[](const Key & hKey)
00377         {
00378                 return find(hKey);
00379         }
00380 
00385         unsigned int count() const
00386         {
00387                 return m_uCount;
00388         }
00389 
00394         bool isEmpty() const
00395         {
00396                 return m_uCount == 0;
00397         }
00398 
00409         void insert(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00410         {
00411                 if(!pData)return;
00412                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00413                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])
00414                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(true);
00415                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00416                 {
00417                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00418                         {
00419                                 if(!m_bCaseSensitive)
00420                                 {
00421                                         // must change the key too
00422                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00423                                         kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00424                                 }
00425                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00426                                         delete e->pData;
00427                                 e->pData = pData;
00428                                 return;
00429                         }
00430                 }
00431                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * n = new KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T>;
00432                 kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,n->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00433                 n->pData = pData;
00434                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->append(n);
00435                 m_uCount++;
00436         }
00437 
00449         void replace(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00450         {
00451                 insert(hKey,pData);
00452         }
00453 
00463         bool remove(const Key & hKey)
00464         {
00465                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00466                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])return false;
00467                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00468                 {
00469                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00470                         {
00471                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00472                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00473                                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->removeRef(e);
00474                                 if(m_pDataArray[uEntry]->isEmpty())
00475                                 {
00476                                         delete m_pDataArray[uEntry];
00477                                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = 0;
00478                                 }
00479                                 m_uCount--;
00480                                 return true;
00481                         }
00482                 }
00483                 return false;
00484         }
00485 
00495         bool removeRef(const T * pRef)
00496         {
00497                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00498                 {
00499                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00500                         {
00501                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00502                                 {
00503                                         if(e->pData == pRef)
00504                                         {
00505                                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00506                                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00507                                                 m_pDataArray[i]->removeRef(e);
00508                                                 if(m_pDataArray[i]->isEmpty())
00509                                                 {
00510                                                         delete m_pDataArray[i];
00511                                                         m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00512                                                 }
00513                                                 m_uCount--;
00514                                                 return true;
00515                                         }
00516                                 }
00517                         }
00518                 }
00519                 return false;
00520         }
00521 
00529         void clear()
00530         {
00531                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00532                 {
00533                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00534                         {
00535                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00536                                 {
00537                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00538                                         if(m_bAutoDelete)
00539                                                 delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00540                                 }
00541                                 KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * pList = m_pDataArray[i];
00542                                 //delete m_pDataArray[i];
00543                                 m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00544                                 delete pList;
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547                 m_uCount = 0;
00548         }
00549 
00558         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * findRef(const T * pRef)
00559         {
00560                 for(m_uIteratorIdx = 0;m_uIteratorIdx<m_uSize;m_uIteratorIdx++)
00561                 {
00562                         if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00563                         {
00564                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00565                                 {
00566                                         if(e->pData == pRef)return e;
00567                                 }
00568                         }
00569                 }
00570                 return 0;
00571         }
00572 
00580         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * currentEntry()
00581         {
00582                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00583                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00584                 return 0;
00585         }
00586 
00591         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * firstEntry()
00592         {
00593                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00594                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00595                 {
00596                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00597                 }
00598                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00599                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00600         }
00601 
00609         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * nextEntry()
00610         {
00611                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00612 
00613                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00614                 {
00615                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00616                         if(t)return t;
00617                 }
00618 
00619                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00620 
00621                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00622                 {
00623                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00624                 }
00625 
00626                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00627 
00628                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00629 
00630         }
00631 
00639         T * current()
00640         {
00641                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00642                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00643                 {
00644                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00645                         if(!e)return 0;
00646                         return e->data();
00647                 }
00648                 return 0;
00649         }
00650 
00658         const Key & currentKey()
00659         {
00660                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00661                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00662                 {
00663                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00664                         if(!e)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00665                         return e->key();
00666                 }
00667                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00668         }
00669 
00675         T * first()
00676         {
00677                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00678                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00679                 {
00680                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00681                 }
00682                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00683                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00684                 if(!e)return 0;
00685                 return e->data();
00686         }
00687 
00695         T * next()
00696         {
00697                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00698 
00699                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00700                 {
00701                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00702                         if(t)
00703                         {
00704                                 return t->data();
00705                         }
00706                 }
00707 
00708                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00709 
00710                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00711                 {
00712                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00713                 }
00714 
00715                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00716 
00717                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00718                 if(!e)return 0;
00719                 return e->data();
00720         }
00721 
00732         void copyFrom(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00733         {
00734                 clear();
00735                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00736                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00737         }
00738 
00746         void insert(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00747         {
00748                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00749                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00750         }
00751 
00759         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
00760         {
00761                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
00762         }
00763 
00773         KviPointerHashTable(unsigned int uSize = 32, bool bCaseSensitive = true, bool bDeepCopyKeys = true)
00774         {
00775                 m_uCount = 0;
00776                 m_bCaseSensitive = bCaseSensitive;
00777                 m_bAutoDelete = true;
00778                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = bDeepCopyKeys;
00779                 m_uSize = uSize > 0 ? uSize : 32;
00780                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00781                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00782         }
00783 
00791         KviPointerHashTable(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00792         {
00793                 m_uCount = 0;
00794                 m_bAutoDelete = false;
00795                 m_bCaseSensitive = t.m_bCaseSensitive;
00796                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = t.m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00797                 m_uSize = t.m_uSize;
00798                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00799                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00800                 copyFrom(t);
00801         }
00802 
00808         ~KviPointerHashTable()
00809         {
00810                 clear();
00811                 delete [] m_pDataArray;
00812         }
00813 };
00814 
00819 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator
00820 {
00821 protected:
00822         const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> * m_pHashTable;
00823         unsigned int                       m_uEntryIndex;
00824         KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * m_pIterator;
00825 public:
00833         void operator = (const KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T> & src)
00834         {
00835                 m_pHashTable = src.m_pHashTable;
00836                 m_uEntryIndex = src.m_uEntryIndex;
00837                 if(src.m_pIterator)
00838                         m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(src.m_pIterator));
00839                 else
00840                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00841         }
00842 
00849         bool moveFirst()
00850         {
00851                 if(m_pIterator)
00852                 {
00853                         delete m_pIterator;
00854                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00855                 }
00856 
00857                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
00858                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
00859                 {
00860                         m_uEntryIndex++;
00861                 }
00862 
00863                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00864                         return false;
00865 
00866                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00867                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
00868                 if(!bRet)
00869                 {
00870                         delete m_pIterator;
00871                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00872                 }
00873                 return bRet;
00874         }
00875 
00882         bool moveLast()
00883         {
00884                 if(m_pIterator)
00885                 {
00886                         delete m_pIterator;
00887                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00888                 }
00889 
00890                 m_uEntryIndex = m_pHashTable->m_uSize;
00891                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
00892                 {
00893                         m_uEntryIndex--;
00894                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
00895                         {
00896                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00897                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
00898                                 if(!bRet)
00899                                 {
00900                                         delete m_pIterator;
00901                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00902                                 }
00903                                 return bRet;
00904                         }
00905                 }
00906                 return false;
00907         }
00908 
00916         bool moveNext()
00917         {
00918                 if(!m_pIterator)
00919                         return false;
00920                 if(m_pIterator->moveNext())
00921                         return true;
00922                 if(m_pIterator)
00923                 {
00924                         delete m_pIterator;
00925                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00926                 }
00927                 m_uEntryIndex++;
00928                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
00929                 {
00930                         m_uEntryIndex++;
00931                 }
00932                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00933                         return false;
00934                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00935                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
00936                 if(!bRet)
00937                 {
00938                         delete m_pIterator;
00939                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00940                 }
00941                 return bRet;
00942         }
00943 
00952         bool operator ++()
00953         {
00954                 return moveNext();
00955         }
00956 
00965         bool movePrev()
00966         {
00967                 if(!m_pIterator)
00968                         return false;
00969                 if(m_pIterator->movePrev())
00970                         return true;
00971                 if(m_pIterator)
00972                 {
00973                         delete m_pIterator;
00974                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00975                 }
00976                 if(m_uEntryIndex >= m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00977                         return false;
00978                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
00979                 {
00980                         m_uEntryIndex--;
00981                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
00982                         {
00983                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00984                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
00985                                 if(!bRet)
00986                                 {
00987                                         delete m_pIterator;
00988                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00989                                 }
00990                                 return bRet;
00991                         }
00992                 }
00993                 return false;
00994         }
00995 
01005         bool operator --()
01006         {
01007                 return movePrev();
01008         }
01009 
01017         T * current() const
01018         {
01019                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01020         }
01021 
01029         T * operator *() const
01030         {
01031                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01032         }
01033 
01040         const Key & currentKey() const
01041         {
01042                 if(m_pIterator)
01043                         return m_pIterator->current()->key();
01044                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
01045         }
01046 
01053         T * toFirst()
01054         {
01055                 if(!moveFirst())
01056                         return NULL;
01057                 return current();
01058         }
01059 public:
01065         KviPointerHashTableIterator(const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & hTable)
01066         {
01067                 m_pHashTable = &hTable;
01068                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
01069                 m_pIterator = NULL;
01070                 moveFirst();
01071         }
01072 
01076         ~KviPointerHashTableIterator()
01077         {
01078                 if(m_pIterator)
01079                         delete m_pIterator;
01080         }
01081 };
